news.body: IALR 0.3e supports the latest version of DL2. Please report bugs using the Bug Report page in the Launcher, thanks and happy gaming
Casual, Survivor, Ultimate, and Insanity have arrived on The Beast. They still need love but heading in a good direction!
HyperMode, 7670 Days Later, Low Gravity, and Winter Slaughterland have been added to The Beast
VolatilesBegone and Remove Weapon attachment visuals has been added to The Beast
Use the mod config page to modify and create your own mods! Save your changes to a custom config and apply after any official update.
The new 3.1.5 Launcher is out! Make sure to grab the latest launcher
